short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the Messages web interface to the list of Google Apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add the "Messages" web interface (messages.google.com) to the Google Apps chooser on most Google sites.

Inspired by https://www.reddit.com/r/GoogleFi/comments/ebfm2t/just_joined_google_fi_is_there_any_way_to_add/
